_instructions: Copy this file to config.json and fill in your Discord server IDs
_how_to_get_ids: Right-click channel/role > Copy ID (Enable Developer Mode in Discord settings)

channels._comment: Channel IDs for restock alerts and approvals
channels._comment2: Set restockApprovalsMD to same as restockApprovals if you want all approvals in one channel

commandChannels._comment: Channel IDs where specific commands can be used (leave empty string "" to allow anywhere)
commandChannels._comment2: If a command channel is set, the command will only work in that channel

channelNames._comment: Friendly channel names for error messages (optional, uses IDs if not set)

roles._comment: Role IDs for mentions and permissions

stores._comment2: Format: "Store Name - Address" (address will be extracted automatically)
va: Target - Store Name - Address, City, State ZIP
md: Target - Store Name - Address, City, State ZIP
